title: Strange Brew
summaries: The Strange Brew is a potion that is purchased from the Skeleton Merchant for 5 each. It restores 400 mana points and 80 health points but inflicts the Mana Sickness and Potion Sickness debuffs upon use. It restores 100 more mana than a Super Mana Potion, making it the potion that restores the most mana with one use in the game.

statistics.Buy: 5
statistics.Sell: 1
